product_title_x: Dove Daily Moisture 2 In 1 Shampoo & Conditioner 400Ml
summary: Dove Daily Moisture 2 In 1 Shampoo & Conditioner 400Ml
description: Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner makes your hair softer, silky smooth and easy to manage. It has been created to nourish and moisturise dry, damaged hair in one simple step. This shampoo and conditioner has a unique formula that helps to enhance and maintain your hair's beauty. As it progressively nourishes with regular use, you will notice that your hair feels healthier after each and every wash. Dove Daily Moisture 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner contains Pro-Moisture Complex, which moisturises hair from deep within the strand and makes hair up to 10x more resilient*. Its formula is lightweight and rinses out easily, so it won't leave your hair feeling heavy or weighed down. You just get to enjoy silky-soft results, day after day. How to use: Apply Dove Daily Moisture 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner like you would a normal shampoo, lather, and rinse. No need for an additional conditioner to protect and detangle your hair. Simply dry and enjoy softer hair that is easy to manage and style. Suitable for everyday use. Globally, Dove does not test on animals. For the last 30 years, Dove has used alternative non-animal methods to test the safety of its products. PETA certified as Cruelty-Free, Dove products carry PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies logo for added peace of mind. *Shampoo and conditioner vs non-conditioning shampoo

product_title_x: TRESemme Conditioner Lamellar Shine
summary: Want to achieve salon-like shiny hair results at home? Tresemme Lamellar Shine conditioner harnesses the power of Lamellar Technology, enveloping each hair fibre to correct, smooth and align your hair for an ultra-glossy glow. Our PRO Style Technology, enriched with amino acids and ceramides, leaves your hair not just strong but effortlessly manageable with each use. To leave your hair looking its shiny best, start your routine with Tresemme Lamellar Shine Shampoo. Then, squeeze a generous amount of Lamellar Shine Conditioner into the palms of your hands and distribute evenly through damp hair, focusing on the ends to mid-lengths first, and work any remaining conditioner up toward the roots. Leave on for 2–3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with Lamellar Shine Leave-In Cream Serum and Finishing Oil and style with your favourite Tresemme styling products as needed. Tresemme, we’ve always understood that style is more than a look: it’s a part of you. With our professional-quality hair care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at Tresemme, from the values we promote – such as not testing on animals and being PETA approved – to the stylists we work with, down to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made with intention, and inspired by the latest trends and style. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style. So, tell your story, land that job, make your mark – and achieve your aspirations with confidence.

countryOfOrigin United Kingdom features Elevate Your Look: Whether your hair is naturally wavy, straight, or curly, Tresemme Lamellar Shine Conditioner is your key to achieving the ultimate salon-grade gloss, Hair Conditioner with Lamellar Technology: Our Lamellar Shine range is designed to correct imperfections while smoothing hair and aligning strands for a sleek and polished finish that lasts, Pro Style Technology for Hair Transformation: Infused with PRO Style Technology, this conditioner works from the inside out, strengthening and managing damaged hair with each use, Carefully Crafted for your Hair: Our team of hair care experts are at the forefront of science & safety. product_title_x: Veet Pure Hair Removal Cream Body & Legs for Sensitive Skin
summary: Veet Hair Removal Cream, with Silky Fresh™ technology. Experience silky smooth skin and delightful scent while removing hair effectively. Veet not only hydrates your skin for up to 24 hours, but also provides long lasting smoothness.
description:
brandMarketing Summer's too short to spend it shaving!
Experience silky smooth and delightfully scented skin with Veet Hair Removal Cream for Sensitive Skin. It works close to the root even on short hair, giving you smoothness for up to a week.
Veet's cream dissolves rather than cuts hair, so unwanted hair takes longer to grow back than with shaving and there's no stubbly feel to regrowth.
Our Sensitive Skin formula comes with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, known for their soothing properties.
Veet Hair Removal Cream not only hydrates your skin for up to 24 hours, but its fragrance technology also ensures that there is no lingering malodour. countryOfOrigin France brand Veet features Suitable Both for Women and Men packageType Pump otherInformation Safety Warning:
Read, follow and retain all precautions and directions before use inside the label. Contains alkali and thioglycolate. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Avoid contact with the eyes.

PRECAUTIONS
- Read & follow all precautions and directions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.
- Suitable for use on the legs, arms, underarms & bikini line. NOT SUITABLE for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples or any other body parts.
- Do not use on varicose veins, scars, moles, spotty, broken, irritated, sunburnt skin or on skin that has had an adverse reaction to hair removal creams in the past. Always leave 72 hours between hair removal sessions.
- Check with your doctor before using if you are on any medication which can affect the skin, if you suffer from any skin related disorder, or if you have a condition which may affect the skin.
- Before every use, TEST YOUR SKIN REACTION by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area you wish to treat, following the directions for use. If after 24 HOURS there is no adverse reaction, continue to use.
- If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice.
- Skin may be more sensitive for a short time after use, so avoid scratching.
- After use we recommend waiting 24 hours before using antiperspirant, any other perfumed product, using artificial tanning equipment, swimming or sunbathing.
- KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
- In case of ingestion, seek medical advice immediately and show outer pack.
- Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice.
- Contains alkali and thioglycolate.
- Product may cause surfaces to become slippery.
- Avoid spillage on carpets, clothes and flooring.

Additional Information:
The name ‘Veet' and the Veet logo are trademarks.

**starts working from 5 minutes

Beautifully smooth skin in just 3 steps:
1 Remove the plug from the pump and turn to unlock.
2 Pump the Veet Cream onto the spatula or your hand and spread evenly to fully coat the hair you want to remove but do not rub in. And don't forget to wash any cream off your hands.
3 Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes, and then use the spatula to gently remove a small test area of cream. If the hair comes away easily, use the wider or narrower end of the spatula, depending on the body part, to remove the rest. If your hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 10 minutes in total - but don't leave it any longer. Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely, and then dry.
Rinse the nozzle and the spatula thoroughly after use.
Replace the plug after each use.

PRECAUTIONS
- Read & follow all precautions and directions before use. Do not exceed 10 minutes total application time.
- Suitable for use on the legs, arms, underarms & bikini line. NOT SUITABLE for use on head, face, eyes, nose, ears, around the anus, genitals and nipples or any other body parts.
- Do not use on varicose veins, scars, moles, spotty, broken, irritated, sunburnt skin or on skin that has had an adverse reaction to hair removal creams in the past. Always leave 72 hours between hair removal sessions.
- Check with your doctor before using if you are on any medication which can affect the skin, if you suffer from any skin related disorder, or if you have a condition which may affect the skin.
- Before every use, TEST YOUR SKIN REACTION by applying and removing the product to a small part of the area you wish to treat, following the directions for use. If after 24 HOURS there is no adverse reaction, continue to use.
- If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the product immediately and rinse thoroughly with cold water. If a burning sensation persists, seek medical advice.
- Skin may be more sensitive for a short time after use, so avoid scratching.
- After use we recommend waiting 24 hours before using antiperspirant, any other perfumed product, using artificial tanning equipment, swimming or sunbathing.
- KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
- In case of ingestion, seek medical advice immediately and show outer pack.
- Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice.
- Contains alkali and thioglycolate.
- Product may cause surfaces to become slippery.
- Avoid spillage on carpets, clothes and flooring.

Additional Information:
The name ‘Veet' and the Veet logo are trademarks.

**starts working from 5 minutes

Beautifully smooth skin in just 3 steps:
1 Remove the plug from the pump and turn to unlock.
2 Pump the Veet Cream onto the spatula or your hand and spread evenly to fully coat the hair you want to remove but do not rub in. And don't forget to wash any cream off your hands.
3 Leave the cream on your skin for 5 minutes, and then use the spatula to gently remove a small test area of cream. If the hair comes away easily, use the wider or narrower end of the spatula, depending on the body part, to remove the rest. If your hair is more stubborn, you can leave the cream on for up to 10 minutes in total - but don't leave it any longer. Rinse your skin thoroughly with water to remove the cream completely, and then dry.
Rinse the nozzle and the spatula thoroughly after use.
Replace the plug after each use.

product_title_x: Eco Warrior Mens Shaving Bar
summary: Totally free from SLS, sulphates, alcohol, parabens, sorbates & silicones. Made from 93.1% Naturally Derived Ingredients. Plant based and 100% Vegan. Leaping Bunny Cruelty Free. Plastic Free, Eco Friendly and Biodegradable (soap and packaging).Say goodbye to traditional men’s toiletries laden with plastic, harmful ingredients and overpowering artificial fragrance and hello to our award-winning Men’s Edit. This Shaving Bar is free from harmful ingredients (such as silicones, sulphates and parabens) that are in traditional shaving foam, making this shaving bar the perfect naturally moisturising alternative. PLUS with its brand new formulation you’ll be guaranteed a luxurious lather without the need for SLS. Made with Coconut Oil & Flax Oil which soothes and moisturises pre/post-shave skin. Fragranced with a blend of essential oils including birch tar, cedarwood and patchouli – ideal for all the places you shave! Plus added Vitamin E to help protect skin. Balancing skin: Cedarwood essential oil naturally tones the skin, helping to remove dead skin cells, without stripping the skin of its natural moisture. Helping the skin look brighter and more youthful. Antimicrobial & anti-inflammatory properties: Patchouli, cedarwood & birch tar essential oils have antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties that can help reduce excess oil, soothe irritated skin and reduce redness. Helpful for those with skin conditions like eczema, dermatitis or acne. Moisturising: Cedarwood, birch tar & patchouli work together to hydrate and moisturise the skin, as it protects it from environmental stressors. Aromatherapy: These essential oils are some of the most versatile oils used in aromatherapy due to their wide range of therapeutic benefits, including stress & anxiety relief.

Say goodbye to dull skin and hello to skin so healthy it glows. Get glowing skin you'll love, without make-up! Enriched with Super Citrus and brightening Vitamin C, it reveals nourished and glowing skin! Our cream helps to replump fine lines and reduce their appearance, leaving skin smooth and radiant. This brightening day cream will boost your skin's glow, kick starting your day feeling confident and bright. Our formula is enriched with Vitamin C*, a dermatological active which helps to boost glow and enhance your skin's radiance. As an antioxidant, it also helps protect your skin from harm such as sun damage. Super Citrus is a natural renewable ingredient that is well known for its brightening properties. Our day cream has also been dermatologically tested and is suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. After 1 Use: Skin is hydrated for 24h and firmer. (Instrumental evaluation on 24 subjects) After 2 Weeks: Skin seems smoother, more luminous and feels tighter, as if lifted. FSC certified cardboard from forests managed with respect to people and nature. product_title_x: Bulldog Skincare for Men Protective Moisturiser
summary: Made in the UK, the Protective Moisturiser from Bulldog contains nine essential oils, including bergamot and ginger to intensely hydrate skin. Specially formulated with anti-inflammatory aloe vera and soothing green tea, the non-greasy cream heals razor burn and irritation to leave skin feeling comfortable all day long. Delivers a broad spectrum SPF15 to shield skin from the sun's harmful rays, ideal for outdoor activities, sport and leisure.
description:
Made in the UK, the Protective Moisturiser from Bulldog contains nine essential oils, including bergamot and ginger to intensely hydrate skin. Specially formulated with anti-inflammatory aloe vera and soothing green tea, the non-greasy cream heals razor burn and irritation to leave skin feeling comfortable all day long. Delivers a broad spectrum SPF15 to shield skin from the sun's harmful rays, ideal for outdoor activities, sport and leisure.
At Bulldog Skincare, we believe in making quality products for men that unlock the true potential of natural origin ingredients.
NATURAL INGREDIENTS - This moisturiser is made with 96% natural origin ingredients, including Aloe vera for lasting hour hydration. VEGAN PRODUCT - Our products are completely vegan, with no ingredients derived from animals. NON GREASY - The quick-absorbing nature of this moisturiser prevents your hands and face from becoming greasy or oily after use. CHEMICAL FREE - Free from parabens, sodium laureth sulfate, artificial colours or synthetic fragrance. SUN PROTECTION - In addition to providing broad spectrum SPF15 sun protection to skin, this moisturiser relieves razor burn and irritation and leaves skin feeling comfortable.

product_title_x: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Spray Moisturiser
summary: Pressed for time but still want effective moisturisation? Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Spray Moisturiser dispenses evenly for all-over coverage, leaving your skin feeling fresh and soft. This light body moisturiser combines healing micro-droplets of Vaseline jelly with aloe vera, known to calm and soothe the skin. The result is a refreshing, non-sticky spray lotion that moisturises and absorbs in seconds to help heal very dry skin, leaving it delicately fragranced with a fresh aloe vera scent. Caring for dry, sensitive skin couldn’t be easier. This body lotion penetrates deep down within the stratum corneum to lock in moisture and form a protective layer on your skin. This sealing barrier speeds up the skin’s natural recovery process. For instantly softer skin, apply the Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Spray Moisturiser daily after showering, or whenever your skin feels dry. Simply hold it 10 cm from skin, spray on target areas and massage in until absorbed. Repeat as needed throughout the day. Our skin is the barrier between our bodies and the outside world, and the health of our skin is essential to our overall well-being. At Vaseline, we’re helping those underserved get better care for their skin. Learn more at our website.
description:
countryOfOrigin Italy brand Vaseline features Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Soothe Spray Moisturiser with Vaseline jelly and aloe vera, Containing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly and aloe vera, this body lotion locks in moisture to hydrate and soothe dry skin, This spray moisturiser dispenses evenly for all-over coverage and absorbs in seconds, helping to heal very dry skin, Our non-aerosol, continuous spray lotion has a non-greasy, non-sticky formula that leaves your skin soft and fresh, Use this moisturiser as part of your daily skin and body care routine – apply for instantly softer skin after showering, or whenever your skin feels dry, Vaseline cares for the skin you're born in, which is why our body lotion is formulated to moisturise dry, rough, dull skin packageType Aerosol manufacturer Unilever Dept ER,

product_title_x: Dove Essential Nourishing Body Lotion 400Ml
summary: Dove Essential Nourishing Body Lotion 400Ml
description: Looking for face care quality skin care for your body? Then try with the Dove Essential Care Body Lotion that’s proven to reduce visible dryness and instantly replenish moisture loss, with the same active ingredients as your face care. This body moisturiser has been specially designed for proven reduction in visible dryness and to instantly replenish moisture loss, with active ingredients found in face care. Made with plant-based Glycerin in our formula is a unique blend of ingredients that works to restore skin's essential lipids and lock in hydration from 1st use. The result? With every application skin feels soft, smooth and nourished. That’s body love, the Dove way. At Dove, we believe your body deserves as much attention as your face, that’s why our NEW body lotions have the same active ingredients as in your face care products, giving your body care routine the boost it needs. 48h moisturisation, dermatologically tested, and made for everyday use, you can count on this long-lasting lotion to leave your skin looking and feeling its best - what better way to spread body love? To use, squeeze a generous amount of lotion on your hands and massage the rich formula into your skin, anywhere on your body, from your legs to your toes, and your hands to your shoulders, this lotion will give your body the hydration boost it needs. If you’re looking for more nourished skin, then try switching to our Dove Essential Care Body Lotion, designed to enrich and hydrate skin from 1st use. Dove believes that no young person should be held back from reaching their full potential. Since 2004, they’ve been building self-esteem and confidence in young people – and by 2030, they’ll have helped ¼ billion through our educational programmes and resources.

product_title_x: Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Lotion
summary: When you have dry, rough, irritated skin you need something that will moisturise it and help it heal fast. In our Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing body lotion, we’ve combined healing micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly with a fast-absorbing, non-greasy moisturising formula. The result is a lotion that moisturises to restore very dry skin, leaving it looking and feeling healthier.Our Essential Healing Intensive Care body lotion has been clinically proven to moisturise deeply** to soothe dry skin with the first application, and to keep it restored for 3 weeks*. Our skin is the barrier between our bodies and the outside world, and the health of our skin is essential to our overall wellbeing. At Vaseline, we believe that healthy skin starts with deep-restoring moisture, which is why our lotion's formula calms and soothes the skin. The micro-droplets of Vaseline Jelly penetrate deep down within the stratum corneum to form a protective layer on your skin and lock in moisture. This sealing barrier speeds up the skin’s natural barrier recovery. This Vaseline moisturiser offers you fast and effective body care and relief for dry, itchy skin, plus the confidence that it is suitable for sensitive skin. Apply Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing moisturising lotion to your skin daily to experience the rich yet quick-absorbing formula which restores the skin from deep within. *based on 4-week treatment clinical study **within stratum corneum

summary: Cocoon skin in a veil of moisture with Childs Farm's intensely hydrating and soothing OatDerma Body Moisturiser, created specifically to help relieve irritation and discomfort of dry, itchy and sensitive skin. Packed with the goodness of oats, this fragrance-free formula is clinically proven to support the skin barrier and provide up to 24 hours of moisturisation. - Instantly soothing and as mild as water- Helps relieve irritation and discomfort of dry skin- Provides up to 24 hours of moisturisation - Perfect for all the family (newborns and upwards) - Formulated with 97% natural origin* ingredients- Enriched with nourishing colloidal oatmeal and ceramide-rich oat oil, sustainably sourced from the Nordics- Also contains cocoa and shea butters for instant moisturisation- Free from mineral oils- Dermatologist and Paediatrician approved for sensitive skin- Also suitable for people who may be prone to eczema- 88% of parents agreed the product provides instant relief from dry and itchy skin after just one use***natural origin ingredients calculated using ISO standard 16128**based on a 2 week user trial with 104 participants

product_title_x: Garnier Ambre Solaire SPF 50+ Water Resistant High Protection Lotion
summary:
Very High Protection: Ambre Solaire Water Resistant Very High Protection Lotion SPF50+ provides advanced UVA and UVB protection against sun induced skin damage and sunburn.
Water Resistant: This water resistant formula provides up to 24 hour hydration and can be used on the face and body.
Packaging: The tube integrates 36% cardboard and has a reduced plastic quantity*.
Ocean Conservancy: Since 2020, Garnier has been joining forces with ocean conservancy to fight ocean plastic.
Leaping Bunny Approved: Approved as cruelty free under the Leaping Bunny Programme.

Garnier Ambre Solaire Water Resistant Very High Protection Lotion SPF50+ provides advanced UVA and UVB protection against sun induced skin damage and sunburn. The water-resistant formula is suitable for face and body. Leaves skin feeling hydrated for up to 24hours, comfortable and well protected.

The moisturising lotion conforms 100% to European recommendations for protection against the harmful effects of UVA and UVB rays. This water resistant suncream offers advanced protection against immediate sun induced skin damage, caused by UVB rays, as well as protection from long-term damage and premature skin ageing caused by UVA rays. The tube integrates 36% cardboard and has a reduced plastic quantity*. Since 2020 Garnier has been joining forces with Ocean Conservancy to fight ocean plastic.

Garnier suncare research is recognised by the British Skin Foundation.

*Compared to a 175ml plastic tube

product_title_x: Pregnacare Breast-Feeding
summary: Expert nutrition for after pregnancy. Vitamins, minerals, Calcium, vit.D. Omega-3 DHA. Vitabiotics Science of Healthy Living. UK's No. 1 pregnancy supplement brand. Britain's No.1 supplements. Queen's Award 4 Times Winner. No Artificial Colours or Preservatives. No Lactose or Yeast. Gluten Free. Pregnacare is Not Tested on Animals.With DHA which contributes to normal development of brain & eyes in breast-fed infants² Expert nutrition for breast-feeding mums Pregnacare Breast-feeding is specially formulated to help support the nutritional requirements of new mothers throughout the postnatal period and while breast-feeding. During this time a healthy, varied diet is vital for new mothers, to help produce nutritious breast milk and maintain their own health and wellbeing. Postnatal micronutrient tablets Carefully formulated by experts, including: - 700mg calcium, vitamins K & D, zinc and magnesium which contribute to the maintenance of normal bones. - Calcium and vitamin K which contribute to normal blood clotting. - Vitamin B6, niacin, iron and magnesium which contribute to normal energy release. - Includes 10μg vitamin D as recommended by the Department of Health for all women while breast-feeding. - Tablets produced to high GMP³ quality. High purity Omega-3 capsules - Maternal intake of DHA (Docosahexaenoic acid) contributes to the normal brain and eye development of breast-fed infants². - Infants have limited capability to synthesize fatty acids, which therefore must be obtained directly from external sources such as the mother's milk. - Each capsule provides 300mg DHA, the level recommended by international experts⁴ (ISSFAL) for mums during lactation. When is Pregnacare Breast-feeding recommended? Pregnacare Breast-feeding provides comprehensive multivitamin support combined with calcium & Omega-3 fatty acids, which are especially important at this time. - The ideal postnatal supplement for the 12 months following childbirth, to help ensure optimum levels of nutrients. - Can be taken whether or not you are breast-feeding and can be used for as long as required. This comprehensive formula replaces other Pregnacare supplements and multivitamins. There is no need to take an additional multivitamin. - To maintain health throughout breast-feeding as the intake recommendations of certain nutrients are increased during lactation. Maternal breast-feeding is strongly recommended for the newborn baby as it provides essential nutrients and antibodies for long term health. - To help maintain normal bone health in mothers who avoid dairy products and for breast-feeding mothers. Contains the recommended 10µg vitamin D3 & the RNI of 700mg calcium (Reference Nutrient Intake). 84 Tabs/Caps (28 days supply) Postnatal vitamin and mineral tablets with calcium plus Omega-3 capsules 1. The pregnancy supplement brand midwives recommend most. 2. A beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 200mg DHA in addition to the recommended

summary: MultiVit Oral Spray
description: A convenient alternative to tablets and capsules. 14 essential nutrients. summary: 14 x 12g Berry flavour hydrolysed bovine collagen food supplement powder with vitamins and sweetener
description:
14 x 12g Berry flavour hydrolysed bovine collagen food supplement powder with vitamins and sweetener
BEAUTY
A delicious, berry flavoured high strength dose of bovine collagen specially formulated with Vitamin C which supports natural collagen formation and functions as an antioxidant for cells in our skin.
This premium, high strength beauty formula contains 8000mg of collagen, one of the most abundant proteins in our skin. Our body's natural collagen production declines as we age so collagen supplements are widely used to replenish levels and support skin.
Our expert blend of 9 vitamins contains Biotin which contributes to the maintenance of normal skin & hair whilst Riboflavin and Niacin contribute to the maintenance of normal skin.
Complete your daily beauty regime with these convenient, fruity flavoured drinkable vitamins.

product_title_x: Vitabiotics Feroglobin Liquid Iron B12
summary:
Gentle iron natural source*
Gentle iron to help support your haemoglobin and red blood cells
*The form of iron used in Feroglobin Liquid is produced from a natural source of iron.

Feroglobin® Liquid is a unique gentle liquid iron formula with nutrients to help maintain health and vitality. Iron contributes to normal formation of red blood cells and haemoglobin and normal oxygen transport in the body.
This special formula also contains vitamin C which increases iron absorption, vitamins B6 & B12 which contribute to normal energy release, plus iron and folate which contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.
Feroglobin's specific blood building nutrients may be of particular benefit for athletes, and for women during the monthly cycle and throughout pregnancy.

With specific nutrients which contribute to:
Reduction of Tiredness & Fatigue (folate)
Normal Formation of Red Blood Cells & Haemoglobin (Iron)

Feroglobin liquid is not tested on animals. Suitable for both adults & children over 3 years. Gentle on the stomach. Delicious taste with natural orange extract, honey and Swiss Alpine malt. Queen's Award 4 Times Winner. No lactose or yeast. No alcohol. No artificial colours. Vegetarian Society Approved.
TSD:
Vitabiotics Feroglobin Liquid Iron B12 Gentle iron natural source*
Gentle iron to help support your haemoglobin and red blood cells
*The form of iron used in Feroglobin Liquid is produced from a natural source of iron.

Feroglobin® Liquid is a unique gentle liquid iron formula with nutrients to help maintain health and vitality. Iron contributes to normal formation of red blood cells and haemoglobin and normal oxygen transport in the body.
This special formula also contains vitamin C which increases iron absorption, vitamins B6 & B12 which contribute to normal energy release, plus iron and folate which contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.
Feroglobin's specific blood building nutrients may be of particular benefit for athletes, and for women during the monthly cycle and throughout pregnancy.

With specific nutrients which contribute to:
Reduction of Tiredness & Fatigue (folate)
Normal Formation of Red Blood Cells & Haemoglobin (Iron) Gentle iron natural source*
